subject: Relationships
title: Marriage Equality: Love Wins
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Marriage Equality: Love Wins.

hook.text: On June 26, 2015, the Supreme Court ruled: same-sex couples have a constitutional right to marry.

buildup.text: The fight lasted decades. Stonewall, AIDS activism, and countless court battles paved the way.

discovery.text: Justice Kennedy wrote: 'No union is more profound than marriage, for it embodies the highest ideals of love.'

twist.text: Opponents predicted disaster. Instead, marriage rates rose and divorce rates stayed stable after the ruling.

climax.text: Marriage equality proved that love's definition can expand â€” without diminishing anyone else's experience.

punchline.text: 'Love wins' wasn't a slogan. It was a legal precedent.
